item.title: Colima, similar tool like Docker Desktop, for Drupal Development
item.description: Colima is a project that is easy to use and fully open source, and it helps in running docker containers on Linux OS and MacOs machines. We know Docker Desktop is no more a complete open source, if you are not using it personally. So now Colima is a tool which does work similar to Docker Desktop and In this article we are going to see how it works alone or along with Docker Desktop on your Linux
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K

item.title: What to Know for Estimating Projects
item.description: Estimating projects is part of project management. And we canâ€™t always estimate a project with 100% accuracy. There will be learning from the failed attempts at estimating projects, maybe with running overtime, or with budget, or with resources etc. If one needs to deliver a project successfully then one must estimate the project as better as possible.
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
